p: Seven Gram-negative bacteria were observed. Phenotype diversity of the endophyte contributes to the Gram reaction and colony morphology of the endophytes [ 51] and hence the diverse endosphere, while the growth rate and size of the host plant also have an effect on the diverse endophytic community [ 52]. The endophytic community of plants is influenced by the age of the host plant, geographic location, and abiotic factors such as temperature [ 52, 53]. This would explain the diversity of the bacterial endophytes isolated.
